leaderboard.title: Security Assessment Leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Security vulnerability testing for home automation agents
leaderboard.query: SELECT agent_id, MAX(scores.overall_score) as best_score, AVG(scores.detection_accuracy) as avg_accuracy, MIN(scores.false_positive_rate) as best_fpr, COUNT(*) as submission_count, MAX(timestamp) as last_submission FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') GROUP BY agent_id ORDER BY best_score DESC, avg_accuracy DESC

recent_submissions.title: Recent Submissions
recent_submissions.query: SELECT agent_id, scores.overall_score, scores.detection_accuracy, timestamp FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10

performance_trends.title: Performance Over Time
performance_trends.query: SELECT agent_id, DATE_TRUNC('day', CAST(timestamp AS TIMESTAMP)) as date, AVG(scores.overall_score) as avg_daily_score FROM read_json_auto('results/*.json') GROUP BY agent_id, date ORDER BY date DESC
